author: fhanik
msg: SSLEngine is an attribute of the APR lifecycle listener to initialize the native SSL layer once per VM.
All HTTP connectors share an attribute called SSLEnabled with true/false values to turn on SSL at the socket level.
The scheme and secure attributes simply override the request.getScheme and request.isSecure values.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Ray Barlow : "Changes the POS adjustments to be != 0 rather than just > 0, it will then show discounts on receipts" (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-388)
